casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Cobb, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Cobb (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 289.]

(No. 94-2038 Submitted November 29, 1994 Decided December 23, 1994.) Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Karen L. Johnson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Robert L. Cobb, pro se. *290 Per Curiam.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated in that court’s opinion.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
